body.description: Move from the street to the gym with a modern look. This newly updated duffel bag features a water-resistant base for all-day durability while you're on the go. Zip end pockets and a small front pocket give you easy access to your personal essentials.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DEFENDER 4 DUFFELS Keep your belongings nearby when you're headed to the gym or a weekend getaway. This updated duffel features zip end pockets, a water-resistant base, a roomy interior for your gear and essentials. Durable Exterior The water-resistant base material keeps your stuff dry. Plenty of room for team embroidery and branding Spacious Interior Multiple zippered pockets give you plenty of storage space. Adjustable shoulder strap - wear at the length that works for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Companion for My Active Lifestyle
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Adidas Defender 4 Medium Duffel Bag, and I must say, it has exceeded all my expectations. As an avid gym-goer and frequent traveler, finding the right bag to suit my active lifestyle has always been a challenge. However, this duffel bag ticks all the boxes and has become my go-to companion for all my adventures.First and foremost, the quality of this bag is exceptional. The materials used are durable and built to withstand the rigors of daily use. From the reinforced base to the sturdy zippers, every aspect of the bag exudes durability and reliability. I have put this bag through its paces, and it has held up remarkably well, showing no signs of wear or tear.The size of the bag is perfect for my needs. The medium-sized option provides ample space to fit all my essentials without feeling bulky or cumbersome. Whether I'm packing my gym clothes, shoes, and accessories, or using it as an overnight bag for short trips, there's always enough room to accommodate everything I need. The main compartment is spacious and easy to access, allowing for hassle-free packing and unpacking.One feature that sets this duffel bag apart is the thoughtful organization. The multiple zippered pockets and interior mesh compartments make it a breeze to keep my belongings neatly organized and easily accessible. I no longer have to dig through a cluttered bag to find what I need. The side pocket is particularly convenient for stashing smaller items like keys, wallet, or phone, ensuring they're within reach whenever I need them.Comfort is another key factor that impressed me about this bag. The adjustable shoulder strap is padded and offers excellent support, making it comfortable to carry even when the bag is fully loaded. The top handles are also well-designed, providing a secure and comfortable grip. Whether I choose to carry it over my shoulder or in hand, I always feel confident and at ease.I can't overlook the stylish design of the Adidas Defender 4 Medium Duffel Bag. The sleek and sporty aesthetic is right up my alley. The iconic Adidas logo adds a touch of authenticity and sets it apart from other duffel bags on the market. I appreciate that it effortlessly combines functionality with a fashionable look, allowing me to transition seamlessly from the gym to other casual settings.Lastly, I must mention the excellent value for money this bag offers. Considering its outstanding quality, durability, and versatility, the price point is more than reasonable. I feel like I've made a smart investment that will serve me well for years to come.In conclusion, the Adidas Defender 4 Medium Duffel Bag has become an integral part of my active lifestyle. Its durability, ample storage space, thoughtful organization, and comfortable design make it a winner in my book. Whether I'm hitting the gym, traveling, or simply running errands, this bag has proven to be the perfect companion. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable, stylish, and functional duffel bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, functionality, and look for the price
reviews.reviewText: I totally love this bag. IMO, it was a great deal. The main department is just right for one person's clothing, etc. needs and the side departments are clutch. They have plenty of space to fit a pair of shoes each, including that of a person who wears size 12 (could easily go even larger I am sure). While spacious enough, it easily fits into the thin lockers at Planet Fitness. I got the green and love the look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bag has been great for traveling. It fits under airplane seats and in the overhead bins. It doubles as a gym bag when we’re not traveling. It holds tons of clothing/other items. It’s durable and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great multi-purpose sports / gym bag
reviews.reviewText: I use this duffel bag primarily for pickleball, 2-4 times a week. I've been using it for almost 4 months and it is holding up quite well, considering it gets used and thrown around pretty good. There are lots of compartments. I use the main compartment to hold multiple paddles, towels and a change of shirt, water bottle and other miscellaneous equipment (knee braces, strapping, etc). One of the side compartments holds half a dozen pickle balls easily. There are small inner compartments for your personals, keys, phone, etc. All this with room to spare.I love the colorway of this bag. The grey cloud-like base layer with the lime green accents looks fantastic.There are cheaper options out there, but I'm happy with my selection. Strong recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very thin canvas and flimsy padding/frame
reviews.reviewText: My daughter needed a gym bag to transport her Taekwondo sparring gear and fell in love with the appearance of the Adidas Defender Medium duffel. The Adidas Defender bag is stylish and affordable, and from a purely cosmetic perspective the bag is nice. However, from a functional, utilitarian perspective, not so much. The Adidas bag is sufficient for my daughter's purpose, as her sparring gear is light-weight, and fortunately the chest-protector and head-gear acts as a rigid frame within the gym bag to help the bag to hold it's shape. Without the rigid nature of her protection gear - the bag would likely collapse and fold up in the middle (while slung using the shoulder straps), with even the lightest of loads. The canvas is very thin and the bottom support "padding" is equally thin and lacking. I'll give the bag 4 stars, as it was affordable and it does meet our specific need...but for any other purpose, I would've likely sent it back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Big and sturdy! Really pretty bag!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the perfect gym bag.
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this gym bag. I go to my gym at least 5 days a week and it carries my clothes and shoes for the day. It's small yet big enough to carry everything and I can also carry it over my shoulder. Made with decent quality.
